snippet: From the upper deck of a Norwegian ferry, the precision of a trio of forklift drivers is a sight to behold.
abstract: Verlyn Klinkenborg Editorial Observer praises the graceful precision of forklift operators who load cargo in the port city of Trondheim, Norway.
lead_paragraph: From the upper deck of a Norwegian ferry, the precision of a trio of forklift drivers is a sight to behold.

headline.print_headline: Shipshape at the Wharf in Trondheim
headline.seo: Shipshape at the Wharf in Trondheim
headline.main: Shipshape at the Wharf in Trondheim
